title: Hormel CEO Discusses Acquisition of Planters
itunes:title: Hormel CEO Discusses Acquisition of Planters
description:
Hormel Foods CEO Jim Snee explains why the acquisition of Planters fits perfectly with the company’s snack brand.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
